## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `bordered`     | `bordered`      |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `columnSticky` | `column-sticky` |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `headerSticky` | `header-sticky` |             | `boolean` | `false` |

## Slots

| Slot              | Description                          |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------ |
|                   | table elements                       |
